item.title: Welcome to TTP
item.itunes:author: Robbie Griffin & Gavin Reim
item.itunes:subtitle: Episode 1
item.itunes:summary: This week Gavin and Robbie recap the Seattle Seahawks vs. Minnesota Vikings game, go over recent headlines and have a special surprise guest.
